description: Make terrific pulled beef tacos at home with this easy recipe. Pulled beef brisket meets chargrilled corn, crunchy slaw and smokey sauce in soft tortillas.
keywords: Taco,High fibre,High protein,Tree nut free,Kale,Beef,Peanut free
name: Pulled Beef Tacos With Chargrilled Corn Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g Woolworths COOK slow cooked beef brisket
4 corn cobs, husks and silks discarded

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 210°C/190°C fan-forced. Heat beef brisket according to packet instructions, reserving sauce sachet.

Meanwhile, heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Spray corn with oil. Cook corn for 10 minutes, turning occasionally, or until charred and tender. Cool for 5 minutes, then using a small knife, cut corn kernels from cobs in chunks. Set aside.
Prepare kaleslaw according to packet instructions. Heat tortillas according to packet instructions.
Using 2 forks, roughly shred beef and toss with half of the reserved sauce sachet. Serve beef on tortillas with kaleslaw, corn and drizzled with remaining sauce.
